/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their windows reflect the sunlight, adding a touch of brightness to the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the transformation of the scene when night falls.

The image is bathed in the soft glow of daylight, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and architecture, a characteristic feature of Beijing's urban landscape.
